name: Mystic Shell
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Magic wraps around you in a translucent, prismatic shell. Your AC is set to 12 + your spellcasting stat, and cannot be reduced or increased.

If you would be struck by a critical hit, the spell ends and converts the critical hit to a normal attack.
empower: Duration increased to 8 hours. No longer shatters on a critical hit, but still prevents critical hits.
